TopicTitle: Beagle 2 probe may have be found

Articles.Content:
According to The Guardian the lost Beagle 2 Mars probe may have been found by the Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter. The UKSA will hold a press conference on 16.01. and tell what they know.

Source: http://www.theguardian.com/science/2015/jan/12/beagle-2-mars-lander-remains-red-planet

Beagle 2 was supposed to land on Mars in 2003 but didn't send a signal after landing. Further tries to contact the lander weren't successful so ESA had to give it up.

Exciting news!

Edited January 13, 2015 by *Aqua*
Maybe we'll finally know the cause of death for sure.

Aliens . Those pesky Greys...

Maybe it hit too hard?

I remember being glued to the TV on that Christmas Day, and being so disappointed when it didn't work.

Poor old Beagle.
